Articles.Content:
Mun part 3 challenge!

In this challenge you must make it to the mun and back with only 3 parts! Although it may seem to be a challenge it is not so hard as it has been proven to be possible!

Rules:

Easy:3 launches and never return.

Normal:2 Launches and come back.

Hard:1 Launch and come back.

Very hard:1 launch and go to the mun twice before coming back.

I wonder who will all accept this challenge!

Note:Must use 1.0.5 and only KER KAC Flight Engineer and Camera tools (For you cinema makers) are allowed in the challenge.

No modded parts so no TARDIS or anything like that!

No cheats on either!

Proof of it being possible:

Note this is not my video so...............Eh who cares this is just to prove it is possible.
Sadly this cannot be done in 1.0 aero
